member.name: IMAGEHLP_CBA_READ_MEMORY
member.summary: Contains information about a memory read operation.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_CBA_READ_MEMORY.buf
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that receives the memory read.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_CBA_READ_MEMORY.bytes
member.summary: The number of bytes to read.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_CBA_READ_MEMORY.bytesread
member.summary: A pointer to a variable that receives the number of bytes read.
